alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern El Paso County through 815 PM MDT... At 742 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Security-Widefield, or 9 miles southeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Security-Widefield around 745 PM MDT. Fountain around 750 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Schriever Space Force Base and Hanover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
